articles.author: F1
articles.title: Perez and Bottas to start from the pit lane for the Australian Grand Prix after parc ferme changes | Formula 1® - Formula 1
articles.description: Sergio Perez and Valtteri Bottas will both be starting today’s Australian Grand Prix from the pit lane, after opting to change their cars under parc ferme regulations.
articles.content:
Sergio Perez and Valtteri Bottas will both be starting todays Australian Grand Prix from the pit lane, after opting to change their cars under parc ferme regulations.

articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: Perez, Bottas to start F1 Australian GP from pitlane - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Red Bull's Sergio Perez and Alfa Romeo driver Valtteri Bottas will start Formula 1's Australian Grand Prix from the pitlane after making car changes under parc ferme rules.
articles.content: Bottas and Perez were due to start on the last row after qualifying 19th and 20th respectively and their teams have decided to make changes to the suspension set-up ahead of Sunday's Melbourne race.… [+1732 chars]
